description:
Ririko is a cool and clever dragon pilot at Misawa base in Aomori Prefecture. She cannot help imagining worst-case scenario for everything, and always has negative thoughts. She fears catching others` eyes, always half crying and cannot live without handkerchiefs. Ririko is very competent and pilots a dragon which disguises E-2C, the Airborne Early Warning aircraft.
Source: Official page
name: Kinutsugai Ririko
